job description:
Job Description

Primary Duties and Responsibilities

• Provide assistance with departments including Operations, IT, Admissions, Curriculum/Training, Marketing, Student Finance, Academics, Registrar in completing projects as related to automation and data storage/retrieval

• Provide data, reporting, and day-to-day operational support to Business Operations

• Provide project management operational support to Business Operations

• Identify, analyze, and address day-to-day operational issues relating to Business Operations

• Implement and execute operational initiatives as assigned, including creating and providing related team training

• Play key role in reporting and analytics efforts for Business Operations. Work with management to identify reporting needs and create/improve periodic reporting.

• Document update, and improve existing online standard operating procedures and process maps

• Improve execution of technology projects by providing business direction, project management, analysis support as needed

• Become business subject matter expert of our student information system (CampusVue) and other business critical applications

• Create, maintain, and improve tools in SQL Server, MS Access and MS Excel (and other platforms as

Associated Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

• Advanced math and statistical skills

• Strong operational, organizational, analytical, and technical skills

• Intermediate financial and operational modeling skills

• Disciplined, able to pay close attention to detail

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills

• Proven ability to solve complex problems

• Ability to manage multiple initiatives concurrently

• Detail and deadline oriented, flexible to rapid change

• Highly motivated and able to motivate others

• Strong organizational and project management skills

• Call center experience a plus

• Experience with MS SQL Server 2008 r2

• Experience with MS office suite including Access, Excel, Project, Visio, HTML a plus

• Flexibility to work evenings and weekends as needed
